entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
